ai-ne29:2.2_0: “Student, the mind is freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-ne29:2.3_0: “Sensual thoughts of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness.”
ai-ne29:2.4_0: “Patience with right view,” and right view, conversion of wisdom is the most important thing.
ai-ne29:2.5_0: all is blamed by the poison.
